Hi morning to all experts here  may I check what will happen to the CPF allocation after reaching FRS on CPF SA account? Will 100% of new CPF contributions goes into OA account?
It remains unchanged. Your SA just continues to grow. The key difference is that you can no longer RSTU  and your MA contributions will overflow into your OA.
